column4: Hi! I have a question about the "Code of conduct". It's about the following phrase: "Nobody knows everything, and nobody is expected to be perfect in the Ubuntu community (except of course the SABDFL)". Who are the SABDFL?
self appointed benevolent dictator for life ;)
I guess Mark would cll himself sabdfl if he had any notions of genuine dictatorship ;)
didn't you get a pm from ubotu?
